message: So, I'm here from Amsterdam. After a long day's work I'd love to grab a drink and chat. What's the best place to meet people in tech/design in SF *without* looking like a drunk douche alone at the bar?
Lol! I'm totally in the same boat. Moved from the UK and can't find that pub experience anywhere that I had in London and have also experience in Amsterdam. Help us!
Go to the Tipsy Pig on Chestnut St.
City Beer Store is a good bet

@spencer I'd recommend polk street if you're looking for a "pub" experience. You guys can also check out the reddit San Francisco subreddit (http://www.reddit.com/r/sanfrancisco/) They're a pretty welcoming bunch
Meetup.com shows you a lot of activity groups you can just ad-hoc join
i guess i focussed too much on "not looking like a drunk douche" :) - they don't server beer, or any alchohol...
Should try out Bluebottle coffee -- great joint
